txt.en: Attention tailors,\n\nRecent weeks have seen the destruction of much of our cloth and leather goods. Because of this, we need to restock in order to restore our trade business. If you can craft these items, please deliver some to Léoflac at our encampment at Ost Guruth.
'This cloak was crafted with much quality and care. With a few more of these, we may once again trade with other people and be left alone to our own devices once more.\n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'

The Eglain have lost most of their cloth and leather goods in recent weeks, and they have asked tailors to craft various items so they might begin restoring the trade that serves as the lifeblood of their community.
Deliver the heavy cotton cloak to Léoflac
Craft a heavy cotton cloak and deliver it to Léoflac at the Eglan-encampment at Ost Guruth.\n\nTo restore their cloth trade, the Eglain require a good number of heavy cotton cloaks.
